name: Expert Captivator Spellcasting
summary: You learn more powerful spells to enchant and deceive.
description:
You learn more powerful spells to enchant and deceive. You learn a 4th-level occult spell. At 12th level, you learn a 5th-level spell, and at 14th level, you learn a 6th-level spell. Each of these spells must come from either the enchantment or illusion school. You Cast these Spells as occult innate spells. You become an expert with spell attack rolls and spell DCs for occult spells.Expert Captivator Spellcasting Leads To...

Master Captivator SpellcastingTraitsArchetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
